uncamelCase

public static String uncamelCase(String camelCasedText)
Call this utility function to uncamel the camelCasedText. So from "CamelCasedText" the return should be "Camel Cased Text"

Parameters:
camelCasedText - text to be converted
Returns:
uncameled text value

removePlural

public static String removePlural(String text)
Call this utility to skip trailing s hoping for the text to be in singular form

Parameters:
text - to be made of singular form
Returns:
text without single trailing s
